Html:
Hi,
Heard a rumor this was discussed. Maybe on top of WPF support for the plugin API?
Use case:
Module A and Module B are developed by different teams. The modules reference different versions of infraLibC. Would be nice if both modules can run within a single instance of the shell.

Any decision on this?

Acer

This could probably work, assuming that you overrride Assembly.Resolve.

In general, I would strongly recommend against it.
It is confusing to debug, horrible to understand and in general make your life harder.
